DataElement.preferredDefinition: Definition of a patient's longterm follow-up and specimen collection agreement made with specified healthcare provider(s).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Involving or being in effect for a long time._The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:Involving or being in effect for a long time.:The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Involving or being in effect for a long time.

The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The result of therapy for a given disease or condition in a patient or group of patients.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.: gathering or assemblage of a part of something intended as a representative of the whole; for physical samples such as soil, microorganisms, chemicals, blood, etc.; do not confuse with DATA COLLECTION.

Concepts.definition: To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.
